title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs locally with a single command-line tool; ships Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, retrieval, agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-user, model manager, OpenAI-compat endpoint).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embedding, model management.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Rails wrapper around Ollama HTTP API; drop-in replacement for OpenAI in Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive TUI chat client written in Go; supports history, markdown, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and persistent storage.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chat interface styled like ChatGPT, backed by Ollama; supports plugins & RAG.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop GUI for Ollama; one-click installers for all platforms.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat, embeddings, and tool helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service containers for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama REST API; zero-dependency, async HTTP, streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio async, streaming, serde types, and embedders.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama; minimal dependencies, cross-compile friendly.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers prompts using a local Ollama instance; slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and retrieval pipelines.
